## AdvancedMetadataSelectorComponent.dragStart() method

Event handler used for handling drag start

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
dragStart(event: DragEvent, column: AdvancedGridColumn): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | <code>DragEvent</code> | Event for dragging |
|  column | <code>AdvancedGridColumn</code> | Column that is being dragged |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
